steps: in a bowl, mix ground poppy seeds, sugar, melted butter, eggs, and vanilla until combined.
roll out the yeast dough into a rectangle.
spread the poppy seed mixture evenly over the dough.
roll the dough tightly and place it in a greased loaf pan.
let it rise for about 30 minutes, then bake at 180°C (350°F) for 45-50 minutes.
cool before dusting with powdered sugar.

mangoPavlova.name: Mango Pavlova
steps: Preheat the oven to 120°C (250°F) and line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold in vinegar and cornflour.
Shape the meringue into a circle on the prepared tray and bake for 1 hour. Turn off the oven and let cool.
Whip the cream and spread over the cooled meringue. Top with mango slices and garnish with mint leaves before serving.

manti.name: Mantı (Turkish Dumplings)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, egg, and water to form a dough. Knead until smooth and let rest for 30 minutes.
In another bowl, mix ground meat, grated onion, salt, and pepper.
Roll out the dough thinly and cut into small squares. Place a small amount of filling in the center of each square.
Fold the squares into triangles and pinch the edges to seal.
Boil in salted water for about 10 minutes until cooked.
Serve with yogurt and sprinkle with paprika.

mapoTofu.name: Mapo Tofu
steps: Heat oil in a pan and fry Sichuan peppercorns until fragrant, then remove them.
Add ground pork to the pan and stir-fry until browned.
Add doubanjiang, garlic, and ginger, and stir-fry for another minute.
Add tofu cubes and gently stir to coat them with the sauce.
Pour in the chicken broth and simmer for 5-6 minutes.
Stir in the cornstarch mixture to thicken the sauce.
Garnish with green onions and serve hot.

margheritaPizza.name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat your oven to 250°C (480°F) to ensure it's hot enough to cook the pizza quickly and evenly.
Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Slice the fresh mozzarella cheese and distribute it evenly on top of the tomato sauce.
Drizzle the pizza with olive oil and sprinkle a pinch of salt to enhance the flavors.
Place the pizza in the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Once baked, remove the pizza from the oven and top it with fresh basil leaves before serving hot.

massamanCurry.name: massaman curry
steps: in a pot, heat a small amount of coconut milk over medium heat.
add massaman curry paste and sauté until fragrant.
add the meat and brown on all sides.
pour in the remaining coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
add onion, potatoes, fish sauce, and sugar.
simmer for about 30-40 minutes until the meat is tender.
serve hot, garnished with peanuts.

matambre_a_la_pizza.name: Matambre a la Pizza
steps: Preheat a grill or oven to medium heat.
Season the flank steak with salt and pepper, and grill or bake until cooked through (about 10-15 minutes depending on thickness).
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the cooked steak.
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes over the top of the sauce.
Return the steak to the grill or oven and cook until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Slice the matambre like a pizza and serve hot.

matchaIceCream.name: Matcha Ice Cream
steps: In a bowl, whisk together sugar and matcha powder.
In a saucepan, heat cream and milk until warm, then add the matcha mixture.
In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolk, then slowly add a bit of the warm mixture.
Combine all and heat until slightly thickened.
Chill in the fridge, then churn in an ice cream maker.

meatPie.name: Meat Pie
steps: In a pan, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef, cooking until browned. Stir in beef broth, Worcestershire sauce, thyme, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F).
Line a pie dish with one sheet of pastry, fill with the meat mixture, and cover with the second sheet. Seal edges and make slits on top.
Brush with beaten egg and bake for 30-35 minutes until golden brown.

meatloaf.name: Meatloaf
steps: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) to prepare for baking.
In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, chopped onion, egg, breadcrumbs, ketchup, salt, and pepper. Mix gently until all ingredients are well incorporated.
Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and shape it into a loaf, smoothing the top and sides.
Optional: Spread additional ketchup on top of the meatloaf for extra flavor.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).
Once cooked, remove from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing. Serve warm with your favorite sides.

medovik.name: medovik
steps: in a bowl, combine honey, sugar, butter, and eggs. mix well and heat over low heat until dissolved.
remove from heat and stir in baking soda. let it cool.
gradually add flour to form a dough. divide into equal parts.
roll out each part into thin layers and bake at 180°C (350°F) for about 5-7 minutes.
for the filling, mix sour cream and sugar together.
layer the baked cakes with the cream mixture, refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

meeGoreng.name: Mee Goreng
steps: cook the yellow noodles according to package instructions. drain and set aside.
in a large wok or frying pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
add the minced garlic and sliced onion, sautéing until fragrant and the onions are translucent.
add the diced tofu and prawns, cooking until the prawns are pink and the tofu is golden brown.
stir in the julienned carrot and shredded cabbage, cooking for about 3-5 minutes until they soften.
push the ingredients to one side of the wok and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. scramble the eggs until fully cooked, then mix with the other ingredients.
add the cooked noodles to the wok, along with soy sauce and chili sauce. toss everything together until well combined.
season with salt and pepper to taste, adjusting the flavors as needed.
serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions and lime wedges on the side.

mercimekCorbasi.name: Mercimek Çorbası
steps: Sauté onion in a pot until translucent.
Add carrots, potato, lentils, and broth.
Simmer until lentils are soft; blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper, serve with lemon.

ingredients: Hummus, baba ghanoush, stuffed grape leaves, and various dips
meze.name: Meze
steps: Prepare various dips like hummus and baba ghanoush.
Serve with pita bread, olives, and cheese on a platter.
Enjoy as an appetizer or side dish.

milanesa.name: Milanesa
steps: Season the cutlets with salt, pepper, minced garlic, and chopped parsley. Let them marinate for 15-30 minutes.
Set up a breading station with flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs in separate shallow bowls.
Dredge each cutlet in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and finally coat in breadcrumbs. Press the breadcrumbs to ensure an even coating.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Fry the breaded cutlets in batches, cooking for about 3-4 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot with lemon wedges.

minestroneSoup.name: Minestrone Soup
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté the chopped onions, carrots, and celery until they begin to soften.
Add the diced potatoes, beans, and chopped tomatoes to the pot, stirring to combine.
Pour in enough vegetable stock to cover the vegetables, bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 30 minutes.
During the last 10 minutes of cooking, add a handful of pasta to the soup and cook until the pasta is tender.
Season the soup to taste with salt and pepper before serving.

misoKatsu.name: Miso Katsu
steps: Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper.
Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with panko breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and fry cutlets until golden brown (about 4-5 minutes per side).
In a separate pot, combine miso paste, mirin, and sugar, and heat until smooth.
Serve cutlets drizzled with miso sauce.

misoSoup.name: Miso Soup
steps: In a pot, bring the dashi broth to a simmer.
Dissolve the miso paste in a small amount of broth, then stir back into the pot.
Add cubed tofu and seaweed, cooking for a few minutes.
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

ingredients: Sweet red bean paste or ice cream (for filling)
mochi.name: Mochi
steps: Soak glutinous rice in water overnight.
Drain and steam the rice until cooked and sticky.
Pound the rice until it becomes a smooth dough.
Dust hands and work surface with cornstarch, then flatten the dough.
Place a small amount of sweet filling in the center and fold the dough over.
Shape into balls and dust with cornstarch before serving.

moiMoi.name: moi moi
steps: blend beans, bell pepper, and onion into a smooth paste.
add oil and salt, mix well.
pour into greased molds or leaves.
steam for 40-50 minutes until firm.
optionally, place boiled eggs in the middle of the moi moi before steaming.

molePoblano.name: Mole Poblano
steps: Heat oil and cook onion and garlic until softened.
Blend chiles with chicken broth and add to pan.
Stir in cocoa powder, peanut butter, tomato sauce, cinnamon, and cumin.
Simmer for 20 minutes until thickened.
Season with salt.

mooPadKrapow.name: moo pad krapow
steps: in a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat and sauté garlic and chilies until fragrant.
add ground pork and cook until browned, breaking it apart as it cooks.
stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and fish sauce, cooking for another 2-3 minutes.
add basil leaves and stir until wilted.
serve hot over cooked jasmine rice.

moussaka.name: Moussaka
steps: Fry eggplant slices in olive oil and set aside.
Cook lamb with onion and garlic, then add tomato sauce, wine, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Layer eggplant and lamb mixture in a baking dish.
Top with bechamel sauce and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45 minutes.

mutterPaneer.name: Mutter Paneer
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until they turn golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears.
Add pureed tomatoes and cook until the oil separates.
Add green peas, garam masala, and salt. Stir and cook until the peas are tender.
Add paneer cubes and stir gently. Simmer for 5 minutes until the paneer absorbs the flavors.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

muttonSamosa.name: Mutton Samosa
steps: Heat oil in a pan, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until softened.
Add ground mutton, cumin seeds, coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until mutton is browned and cooked through.
Allow the filling to cool.
Fill the samosa pastry with the mutton mixture and seal the edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

nabe.name: Nabe
steps: In a nabe pot, combine dashi stock, soy sauce, and mirin.
Add chicken, napa cabbage, tofu, and mushrooms.
Bring to a boil and simmer until ingredients are cooked.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions.

nalesniki.name: nalesniki
steps: in a bowl, whisk together flour, eggs, milk, sugar, melted butter, and salt until smooth.
heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease.
pour a ladleful of batter into the skillet, swirling to coat evenly.
cook for about 1-2 minutes until edges lift, then flip and cook for another minute.
repeat with remaining batter, stacking cooked crepes on a plate.

ingredients: 100g chicken breast, diced (or shrimp, tofu, or mixed vegetables)
nasiGoreng.name: Nasi goreng
steps: heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium heat.
add the minced garlic and chopped onion. sauté until fragrant and the onion is translucent.
stir in the sliced red chilies and cook for another minute.
add the diced chicken (or your choice of protein) and cook until it's no longer pink.
push the mixture to one side of the wok and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. scramble the eggs until cooked, then mix with the other ingredients.
add the cooked rice to the wok, breaking up any clumps. stir everything together.
pour in the soy sauce and sweet soy sauce (kecap manis). mix well to ensure the rice is evenly coated.
season with salt and pepper to taste. stir-fry for a few more minutes until heated through.
remove from heat and garnish with chopped green onions.
serve the nasi goreng hot on a plate.
garnish with additional green onions and serve with cucumber and tomato slices on the side.

ingredients: 1/2 cup long beans, cut into 1-inch pieces
nasiKerabu.name: Nasi kerabu
steps: rinse the jasmine rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
in a pot, add the rinsed rice and enough water to cook. add the blue pea flower for coloring.
cook the rice according to the package instructions, usually about 15-20 minutes.
once cooked, fluff the rice and set aside.
in a bowl, marinate the chicken breast with soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper for at least 30 minutes.
grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until fully cooked. slice it into thin strips once cooled.
in a small bowl, mix sambal belacan with lime juice to taste. adjust according to your spice preference.
on a plate, serve a portion of the colored rice.
arrange the bean sprouts, long beans, cucumber, cabbage, mint, and coriander around the rice.
top with the sliced grilled chicken and drizzle the sambal over the dish.
optionally, garnish with additional herbs or a lime wedge for serving.

nasiLemak.name: Nasi lemak
steps: rinse the rice thoroughly and drain.
in a rice cooker, combine rice, coconut milk, pandan leaves, salt, and 2 cups of water.
cook the rice until done and fluffy.
while the rice cooks, prepare the fried anchovies and peanuts.
in a pan, fry the anchovies until crispy, then set aside.
in the same pan, fry the peanuts until golden brown and set aside.
boil the eggs until hard-boiled, then peel and slice them.
slice the cucumber into thin rounds and set aside.
prepare sambal by frying chili paste in oil until fragrant.
serve the cooked rice with fried anchovies, peanuts, eggs, cucumber, and sambal on the side.

natto.name: Natto
steps: Stir the natto with the soy sauce until well combined.
Serve over a bowl of steamed rice.
Top with chopped green onions.

nikujaga.name: Nikujaga
steps: In a pot, sauté onions until translucent.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add potatoes and carrots, then pour in dashi broth, soy sauce, mirin, and sugar.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are tender (about 20 minutes).
Season with salt to taste and serve hot.

ingredients: 500g assorted meat (beef, goat meat, or tripe)
ofadaRiceAyamaseSauce.name: Ofada Rice and Ayamase Sauce
steps: rinse the ofada rice thoroughly under cold water to remove any impurities and excess starch.
in a pot, combine the rinsed rice and 4 cups of water. add salt to taste.
bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low once it starts boiling.
cover the pot and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
once cooked, fluff the rice with a fork and allow it to sit covered for a few minutes before serving.
blend the green bell peppers, scotch bonnet peppers, and onion together until smooth. set aside.
in a pot, heat the palm oil over medium heat until it becomes clear, being careful not to overheat it.
add the blended pepper mixture to the oil and stir well. cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens.
while the sauce is cooking, boil the assorted meat in a separate pot until tender. drain and add the meat to the sauce.
stir in the ground crayfish, seasoning cubes, and salt. mix well and let the sauce simmer for another 5-10 minutes.
taste and adjust the seasoning as needed, then remove the sauce from heat.
serve the ofada rice on a plate and pour the ayamase sauce generously over it.
optionally, garnish with sliced onions or fresh herbs for added flavor.

ofeNsala.name: Ofe Nsala
steps: boil the catfish with pepper and seasoning.
add pounded yam to thicken the soup.
stir in uziza leaves and cook for 5 minutes.
serve with pounded yam.

okayu.name: Okayu
steps: In a pot, combine rice and water, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until rice is soft and porridge-like, about 30 minutes.
Season with salt and serve topped with pickled plum.

okonomiyaki.name: Okonomiyaki
steps: In a large bowl, mix flour and dashi broth until smooth.
Add cabbage, green onions, pickled ginger, and eggs to the mixture.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add a little oil.
Pour a ladleful of batter into the skillet and spread it into a circle.
Layer sliced pork belly on top and cook for about 5-7 minutes.
Flip and cook for another 5-7 minutes until cooked through.
Drizzle with okonomiyaki sauce and mayonnaise, then sprinkle with aonori and katsuobushi before serving.

olivierSalad.name: olivier salad
steps: in a large bowl, combine the potatoes, carrots, pickles, chicken, eggs, and peas.
add mayonnaise and mix until well combined.
season with salt and pepper to taste.
chill in the refrigerator for at least an hour before serving.
serve cold as a side dish or appetizer.

ingredients: Fillings (like pickled plum, tuna, or salmon)
onigiri.name: Onigiri
steps: Wet your hands and sprinkle salt on them.
Take a small amount of rice and flatten it in your palm.
Place your filling in the center and shape the rice into a triangle.
Wrap with a strip of nori and serve.

ossoBuco.name: Osso Buco
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan and sear the veal shanks on all sides until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté the chopped onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Deglaze the pan with white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.
Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan, then return the veal shanks to the pan, ensuring they are partially submerged in the sauce.
Cover the pan and simmer on low heat for about 2 hours, or until the veal is tender and falling off the bone.
Before serving, top the osso buco with a sprinkling of gremolata for a burst of fresh flavor.

padThai.name: Pad Thai
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook shrimp until pink and set aside.
Scramble eggs in the same pan.
Add garlic and chili, then stir in fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar.
Add noodles, bean sprouts, and shrimp.
Toss with peanuts and green onions.
Serve with lime wedges.

paella.name: Paella
steps: Heat olive oil in a paella pan and brown the chicken.
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper, and sauté until soft.
Stir in rice and saffron, then pour in chicken broth.
Add shrimp and cook without stirring until rice is tender.
Let rest before serving.

palakPaneer.name: Palak Paneer
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell goes away.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft and mushy.
Pour in the spinach puree and cook for 5 minutes on medium heat.
Add paneer cubes, garam masala, and salt. Stir well and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

panangCurry.name: Panang curry
steps: in a pot, heat a small amount of coconut milk over medium heat.
add panang curry paste and sauté until fragrant.
add the meat and cook until browned.
pour in the remaining coconut milk and bring to a simmer .
Add fish sauce and sugar, cooking for another 10-15 minutes until the meat is tender.
Serve hot, garnished with kaffir lime leaves.

pancakes.name: Pancakes
steps: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt until well combined.
In another bowl, combine the buttermilk, egg, and melted butter. Whisk until smooth.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, mixing gently until just combined. Be careful not to overmix; it's okay if the batter is a bit lumpy.
Preheat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Lightly grease with oil or cooking spray if needed.
Pour a small amount of batter onto the skillet to form a pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, about 2-3 minutes.
Flip the pancake and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until golden brown.
Repeat with the remaining batter, adjusting the heat as necessary. Serve hot with syrup, butter, or your favorite toppings.

pancitCanton.name: Pancit Canton
steps: In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil. Stir-fry the garlic and onion until fragrant.
Add the chicken breast, cooking until fully cooked and lightly browned.
Add the julienned carrot and sliced cabbage, stir-frying until the vegetables are tender.
Pour in soy sauce and mix well. Add the pancit canton noodles, tossing everything together until well combined and heated through.
Season with pepper to taste and serve hot.

pancitPalabok.name: Pancit Palabok
steps: Cook the rice noodles according to the package instructions, then drain and set aside.
In a saucepan, prepare the sauce by mixing shrimp broth and annatto oil. Heat until warm.
To serve, place the noodles on a plate and top with the sauce, followed by shrimp, crushed pork cracklings, sliced boiled eggs, and chopped green onions.
Serve immediately, garnished with lime or calamansi if desired.

paneerButterMasala.name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears.
Add pureed tomatoes and cook until the oil separates from the masala.
Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Add the cubed paneer and stir gently to coat the paneer with the masala.
Pour in fresh cream and simmer on low heat for 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

paniPuri.name: Pani Puri
steps: Gently crack a small hole in each puri shell.
Fill the puris with mashed potatoes and boiled chickpeas.
Add tamarind chutney and mint water to each puri according to taste.
Top with chopped onions and coriander for garnish.
Serve immediately for the best crunch.

panzanella.name: Panzanella
steps: Toast bread cubes in olive oil.
Combine bread, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion.
Whisk olive oil and vinegar and toss with salad.
Garnish with basil, salt, and pepper.

papaALaHuancaína.name: Papa a la Huancaína
steps: boil and slice the potatoes.
blend ají amarillo, queso fresco, crackers, evaporated milk, and oil to form a smooth sauce.
arrange potato slices on a plate.
pour the sauce over the potatoes.
garnish with hard-boiled eggs and black olives.

paskha.name: Paskha
steps: in a bowl, mix cottage cheese, butter, sugar, and egg yolks until smooth.
add dried fruit, vanilla extract, and salt. mix well.
line a mold with cheesecloth and fill it with the mixture.
press down and refrigerate for at least 12 hours.
unmold and serve chilled.

pastaCarbonara.name: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook pancetta in olive oil until crispy.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat and mix in egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley.

pastaEceci.name: Pasta e Ceci
steps: In a pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté minced garlic and chopped rosemary until fragrant.
Add canned chickpeas, a couple of tablespoons of tomato paste, and enough water to create a sauce.
Simmer for about 10 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a separate pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
Drain the pasta and add it to the chickpea mixture, stirring to combine.
Serve hot, drizzled with extra olive oil if desired.

pastaPesto.name: Pasta al Pesto
steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of salted boiling water according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a food processor, blend fresh basil, pine nuts, minced garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese until finely chopped.
With the processor running, slowly add olive oil until the mixture becomes a smooth paste. Season with salt to taste.
Toss the cooked pasta with the pesto sauce until well coated, and serve immediately.

pastaPrimavera.name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of salted boiling water according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté sliced zucchini, carrot, and bell pepper until tender.
Add halved cherry tomatoes to the skillet and cook until softened.
Toss the cooked pasta with the sautéed vegetables and season with salt to taste.
Serve hot, topped with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.

patatasBravas.name: Patatas Bravas
steps: Peel and cut potatoes into cubes.
Boil potatoes until slightly tender, then drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan and fry potatoes until crispy.
Sprinkle with paprika, cayenne, and salt.
Serve with garlic aioli.

pavBhaji.name: Pav Bhaji
steps: Heat butter in a pan, add onions and sauté until soft and translucent.
Add tomatoes and bell peppers, cook until they soften and blend well.
Add mashed potatoes and mix everything together, ensuring no lumps.
Sprinkle pav bhaji masala and salt, and mix well. Cook for a few minutes until the flavors meld together.
Toast the pav with butter on a hot griddle until golden brown.
Serve hot pav bhaji with a dollop of butter and chopped onions.

pavlova.name: Pavlova
steps: Preheat oven to 275°F (135°C).
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Gradually add sugar, vanilla, and lemon juice.
Fold in cornstarch.
Shape meringue into a disk and bake for 1 hour.
Cool, then top with whipped cream, berries, and mint leaves.

pekingDuck.name: Peking Duck
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F).
In a bowl, mix honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and five-spice powder.
Brush the mixture all over the duck and let it sit for 30 minutes.
Roast the duck in the oven for 1.5-2 hours until the skin is crispy.
Slice the duck and serve with hoisin sauce, green onions, and pancakes.

ingredients: butter and sour cream for serving
pelmeni.name: pelmeni
steps: in a bowl, combine the ground meat, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper. mix well.
in another bowl, mix flour, egg, and water to form a dough. knead until smooth.
roll out the dough to about 2mm thickness. cut into circles using a glass.
place a teaspoon of filling in the center of each circle. fold over and pinch the edges to seal.
boil water in a large pot. drop in the pelmeni and cook for about 5-7 minutes until they float.
remove and serve hot with melted butter and sour cream.

pepperSoup.name: pepper soup
steps: boil the goat meat with onions, salt, and water.
add pepper soup spice and crayfish. simmer for 20 minutes.
add scent leaves and adjust seasoning.
serve hot with boiled yam or rice.

pho.name: Pho
steps: Char onion and ginger in a hot pan until fragrant.
Add spices and beef broth. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Strain the broth and return to pot. Add beef slices and cook briefly.
Prepare rice noodles according to package instructions.
Serve hot broth over noodles with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, lime, chili, and fish sauce.

pide.name: Pide
steps: Mix flour, water, yeast, and salt to form a dough.
Let rise for 1 hour.
Shape dough into oval boats and add desired toppings.
Bake in a preheated oven until golden.

ingredients: 1 cup cheese (like cottage cheese or farmer's cheese)
pierogi.name: pierogi
steps: in a bowl, combine flour and salt. make a well in the center and add the egg.
gradually add water while mixing until a dough forms. knead until smooth.
cover the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes.
in a separate bowl, mix mashed potatoes and cheese. season with salt and pepper.
roll out the dough to about 1/8 inch thick and cut into circles using a glass.
place a spoonful of filling in the center of each circle and fold over, sealing the edges.
boil pierogi in salted water until they float, about 3-4 minutes.
drain and optionally fry in butter until golden brown before serving.

pimientosDePadron.name: Pimientos de Padrón
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add Padrón peppers and sauté until blistered and slightly charred.
Remove from heat and sprinkle with sea salt.
Serve warm as a tapas dish.

pimientosRellenos.name: Pimientos Rellenos
steps: Cook rice and set aside.
Sauté onion and garlic, then add ground meat until browned.
Mix in cooked rice and tomato sauce, then stuff into halved bell peppers.
Bake until peppers are tender.

pinakbet.name: Pinakbet
steps: In a pot, sauté the pork belly and chopped tomato until the pork is browned.
Add the sliced vegetables and shrimp paste, stirring to combine.
Add a small amount of water if needed, cover, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
Season with salt to taste before serving with rice.

pineappleBuns.name: Pineapple Buns (Bolo Bao)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, yeast, sugar, and milk to form a dough. Knead until smooth and let it rise for 1 hour.
In another bowl, mix butter, sugar, and vanilla extract to make the topping dough.
Divide the dough into small balls, flatten them, and add a piece of the topping dough on top.
Bake the buns at 180°C (350°F) for 20-25 minutes until golden.
Serve warm.

pineappleFriedRice.name: Pineapple fried rice
steps: in a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
add shrimp or chicken and cook until pink and cooked through.
push the meat to one side and scramble the beaten eggs on the other side.
add cooked rice, pineapple chunks, soy sauce, and cashews, stirring everything together.
cook for another 3-4 minutes until heated through.
serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions.

pirogiCabbage.name: pirog with cabbage
steps: in a bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk and let it activate for about 10 minutes.
add sugar, melted butter, egg, salt, and flour. knead until smooth.
cover and let the dough rise for 1 hour.
in a skillet, sauté onion until golden, then add cabbage and cook until soft.
roll out the dough and place the cabbage filling in the center. fold and seal.
place on a baking sheet and let rise for another 30 minutes.
bake at 180°c (350°f) for 25-30 minutes until golden.

ingredients: filling of choice (e.g., meat, cabbage, or fruit)
pirozhki.name: pirozhki
steps: in a bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk and let it activate for about 10 minutes.
add sugar, melted butter, egg, salt, and flour. knead until smooth.
cover and let the dough rise for 1 hour.
divide the dough into small balls, flatten each, and add filling.
fold and seal the edges, forming a pocket.
place on a baking sheet and let rise for another 30 minutes.
bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

pirozhkiCherries.name: Pirozhki with Cherries
steps: in a bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk and let it activate for about 10 minutes.
add sugar, melted butter, egg, salt, and flour. knead until smooth.
cover and let the dough rise for 1 hour.
divide the dough into small balls, flatten each, and add a spoonful of cherries.
fold and seal the edges, forming a pocket.
place on a baking sheet and let rise for another 30 minutes.
bake at 180°c (350°f) for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

pisto.name: Pisto
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté onion and bell pepper until softened.
Add zucchini and cook until tender.
Stir in chopped tomatoes and season with salt and pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until thickened.
Fry the eggs sunny-side up and serve on top of the pisto.

plackiZiemniaczane.name: placki ziemniaczane
steps: in a bowl, combine grated potatoes, onion, egg, flour, salt, and pepper.
heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
drop spoonfuls of the mixture into the hot oil, flattening them slightly.
fry until golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
drain on paper towels and serve hot with sour cream.

poha.name: Poha
steps: Rinse poha in water and drain well. Set aside for 5 minutes to soften.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, and let them splutter.
Add curry leaves, chopped onions, and green chilies. Sauté until the onions become translucent.
Sprinkle turmeric powder and add the drained poha. Mix well and season with salt.
Cook for 2-3 minutes on low heat, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

polenta.name: Polenta
steps: Bring 1 liter of water to a boil in a large pot.
Slowly stir in the cornmeal, whisking constantly to prevent lumps.
Cook the mixture on low heat, stirring continuously, until it thickens (about 30-40 minutes).
Once thick, stir in butter and grated Parmesan cheese until well combined.
Serve hot, either soft or allowed to set and sliced.

polloALaBrasa.name: Pollo a la Brasa
steps: mix soy sauce, vinegar, mustard, oil, ají panca, cumin, salt, and pepper.
rub the marinade all over the chicken, inside and out.
let the chicken marinate for at least 3 hours, preferably overnight.
preheat the oven to 200°c (400°f).
roast the chicken for 1 hour, or until golden brown and fully cooked.
serve with french fries and a green salad.

polloAllaCacciatora.name: Pollo alla Cacciatora
steps: In a large skillet, sauté the chicken thighs in olive oil over medium heat until golden brown on all sides. Remove and set aside.
In the same skillet, add chopped onion, diced carrots, and minced garlic, cooking until softened.
Deglaze the pan with white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.
Add the chopped tomatoes and fresh rosemary to the skillet, stirring to combine.
Return the chicken to the pan, cover, and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and tender.

porkAdobo.name: Pork Adobo
steps: Marinate pork in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Cook pork with marinade, water, onion, bay leaves, peppercorns, and sugar until tender.
Season with salt and serve.

porkBellyBao.name: Pork Belly Bao
steps: Cook pork belly with soy sauce, sugar, and rice wine until tender and caramelized.
Serve slices of pork belly in bao buns with hoisin sauce and pickled vegetables.

porkChops.name: Pork Chops
steps: Season pork chops with paprika, salt, and pepper.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat and add garlic.
Cook pork chops for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden and cooked through.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

porkDumplings.name: Pork Dumplings
steps: In a bowl, mix pork, garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, and green onion.
Place a small amount of filling in the center of each dumpling wrapper and fold to seal.
Boil or steam the dumplings for 8-10 minutes.
Serve hot with dipping sauce.

potatoBake.name: Potato Bake
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Layer potatoes and onions in a baking dish, seasoning with salt and pepper between layers.
Pour cream over the top and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 1 hour until golden and bubbly.

potatoLeekSoup.name: Potato Leek Soup
steps: Heat olive oil and cook leeks, onion, and garlic until softened.
Add potatoes and broth, then simmer until potatoes are tender.
Blend soup until smooth and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

potatoSalad.name: Potato Salad
steps: Boil potatoes until tender. Drain and cool.
Mix mayonnaise and mustard in a bowl.
Add potatoes, red onion, celery, salt, and pepper.
Gently toss to combine.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

poundedYam.name: pounded yam
steps: boil yam pieces in water until soft.
pound the cooked yam in a mortar or use a food processor.
continue pounding until smooth and stretchy.
serve with egusi soup or any Nigerian soup.

poutine.name: Poutine
steps: Cook French fries according to package instructions.
Heat beef gravy until hot.
Place fries on a plate and top with cheese curds.
Pour hot gravy over the fries and cheese.
Serve immediately.

prawnCocktail.name: Prawn Cocktail
steps: In a bowl, mix mayonnaise, tomato sauce, and lemon juice.
Arrange lettuce leaves on serving plates, top with prawns, and drizzle with the sauce.
Garnish with lemon wedges and serve chilled.

ingredients: 1 round of provolone cheese (about 1 inch thick)
provoleta.name: Provoleta
steps: Heat a grill or heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
Brush the provolone round with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano and red pepper flakes.
Place the cheese on the hot grill or pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the bottom is golden and crispy, and the cheese starts to melt but still holds its shape.
Carefully flip the cheese and cook for another 2-3 minutes on the other side.
Serve immediately, either plain or topped with chimichurri sauce.

pulpoGallego.name: Pulpo a la Gallega
steps: Boil the octopus in salted water for about 40 minutes until tender.
Remove and let cool, then slice into pieces.
Boil the potatoes until soft, then slice them.
Arrange the potato slices on a plate, top with octopus slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika and salt.

pumpkinSoup.name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add pumpkin cubes and vegetable broth, bringing to a boil.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes until pumpkin is tender.
Blend until smooth, stir in cream, and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with pumpkin seeds.

rajmaChawal.name: Rajma Chawal
steps: Soak rajma overnight, then cook in a pressure cooker until soft.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and let them crackle.
Add chopped onions and ginger-garlic paste, sauté until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they break down into a thick sauce.
Add cooked rajma, garam masala, and salt. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

rakija.name: Rakija
steps: Mash plums and mix with sugar.
Add water and yeast, then ferment for 2 weeks.
Distill the mixture to produce rakija.

ramen.name: Ramen
steps: Heat sesame oil and cook garlic until fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce, and miso paste.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
Divide noodles into bowls, pour broth over them, and top with spinach, green onion, egg, and nori.

rassolnik.name: Rassolnik
steps: in a pot, bring water to a boil and add meat. cook until tender.
add diced potatoes, carrots, and onions, cooking until softened.
stir in pearl barley and cook until tender, about 30 minutes.
add diced pickles and season with salt and pepper.
serve hot, garnished with fresh dill.

ratatouille.name: Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook onion and garlic until softened.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook until tender.
Stir in tomato sauce, thyme, and basil.
Simmer for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot or cold as a side dish or main course.

ravioli.name: Ravioli
steps: Roll out the pasta dough on a floured surface until thin.
Cut the dough into squares, about 5cm by 5cm.
In a bowl, mix together ricotta, chopped spinach, and grated Parmesan.
Place a small amount of filling in the center of each square.
Moisten the edges of the dough with water, fold over, and seal tightly.
Boil the ravioli in salted water until they float, about 3-4 minutes.
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil or your choice of sauce.

redCookedPork.name: Red-Cooked Pork
steps: In a pan, caramelize sugar over low heat until it turns brown.
Add pork belly to the pan and stir until coated with caramelized sugar.
Add soy sauce, rice wine, garlic, ginger, star anise, green onion, and water. Bring to a boil.
Simmer the pork for 1 hour until tender.
Serve hot.

rendang.name: Beef rendang
steps: heat oil in a pot and sauté shallots and garlic until fragrant.
add chili powder and coriander powder, stirring for 2 minutes.
add the beef cubes and cook until browned on all sides.
pour in coconut milk and tamarind paste, and mix well.
add bruised lemongrass stalks and kaffir lime leaves.
reduce the heat to low and simmer the mixture for 1-2 hours.
stir occasionally, allowing the liquid to reduce and thicken.
once the beef is tender and the sauce has thickened, remove from heat.
let it rest for 10 minutes before serving.
serve hot with steamed rice or flatbread.

ingredients: 2-3 fresh red chilies, blended into a paste
rendangAyam.name: Rendang ayam
steps: heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. add chopped onion, garlic, ginger, and galangal. sauté until fragrant.
add the blended chili paste and turmeric powder to the pot. cook for a few minutes until the oil separates from the spice mixture.
add the chicken pieces to the pot, stirring to coat them with the spice mixture. cook for about 5-7 minutes until the chicken is slightly browned.
pour in the coconut milk, tamarind paste, kaffir lime leaves, and bruised lemongrass. stir well.
bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. simmer uncovered for about 1-1.5 hours, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is tender and the sauce thickens.
season with salt and sugar to taste. adjust the seasoning as needed.
serve the rendang ayam hot with steamed rice or flatbreads.
optionally, garnish with additional kaffir lime leaves or fresh herbs.

ribollita.name: Ribollita
steps: In a large pot, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add drained cannellini beans, chopped kale, and vegetable stock, stirring to combine.
Simmer for about 30 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Tear stale bread into pieces and stir into the soup to thicken.
Serve hot, drizzled with olive oil.

risotto.name: Risotto
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add rice and cook until lightly toasted.
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed.
Add broth gradually, stirring frequently, until rice is tender.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

risottoMilanese.name: Risotto alla Milanese
steps: Sauté the onion in butter over medium heat until it becomes soft and translucent.
Add the arborio rice to the pan and toast it for a couple of minutes, stirring constantly.
Gradually add the chicken stock to the rice, one ladle at a time, stirring continuously until the stock is absorbed.
Once the rice is creamy and tender, stir in the saffron threads to give the risotto its distinctive color and flavor.
Mix in the grated Parmesan cheese, adjust the seasoning with salt, and serve immediately.

risottoMushroom.name: Risotto with Mushrooms
steps: Cook mushrooms in olive oil and set aside.
In the same pan, cook onion until translucent.
Add rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in wine and stir until absorbed.
Add broth gradually, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy.
Stir in mushrooms, Parmesan, and butter.
Season with salt and pepper.

roastPumpkinSalad.name: Roast Pumpkin Salad
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F).
Toss pumpkin cubes with olive oil, salt, and pepper, then roast for 25-30 minutes until tender.
In a bowl, combine spinach, roasted pumpkin, feta, and walnuts.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar before serving.

rocotoRelleno.name: Rocoto Relleno
steps: cut off the tops of the rocoto peppers and remove the seeds.
boil the peppers in water for 5-10 minutes to reduce heat.
sauté onions and ground beef in a pan.
add ají panca paste and cook for 5 minutes.
stuff the peppers with the beef mixture and chopped boiled egg.
top with grated cheese and bake at 180°c (350°f) for 20 minutes.

roganJosh.name: Rogan Josh
steps: Heat ghee in a pan and fry onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears.
Add mutton pieces and sear until they turn brown on all sides.
Whisk yogurt and add it to the pan, stirring constantly to avoid curdling.
Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Stir well to coat the mutton.
Add enough water to cover the mutton and bring to a boil.
Lower the heat and let it simmer until the mutton is tender and the gravy thickens.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

ingredients: bananas, nutella, or sugar for filling
roti.name: Roti
steps: in a bowl, combine flour, water, condensed milk, and salt to form a dough.
knead the dough until smooth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
divide the dough into small balls and flatten them into thin rounds.
heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook the dough until golden brown on both sides.
fill with bananas or nutella, fold, and serve hot with sugar or condensed milk.

rotiCanai.name: Roti Canai
steps: in a bowl, combine flour, salt, and sugar.
add ghee and rub into the flour mixture until crumbly.
gradually add water and knead into a smooth dough.
cover the dough and let it rest for at least 1 hour.
divide the dough into small balls and flatten each ball into a thin circle.
heat a pan over medium heat and brush with oil.
cook each roti for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden and crispy.
serve with curry or dhal for dipping.

sabaShioyaki.name: Saba Shioyaki
steps: Sprinkle salt on the saba fillets and let sit for 15 minutes.
Preheat a grill or broiler.
Grill fillets skin-side down for about 5-7 minutes until cooked through.
Serve with lemon and shredded daikon.

sahandaEgg.name: Sahanda Egg
steps: Sauté onion in butter until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until softened.
Crack eggs over the mixture, season with salt and pepper, and cook until set.

salatkaJarzynowa.name: sałatka jarzynowa
steps: in a large bowl, combine diced potatoes, carrots, peas, apple, and pickles.
add mayonnaise, salt, and pepper, mixing well to combine.
chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.
garnish with fresh dill.

salmonConPimientos.name: Salmon con Pimientos
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté sliced onion until soft.
Add sliced bell peppers and cook until tender.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper, then place on top of vegetables.
Cover and cook for about 10 minutes until salmon is cooked through.

salmonWithAsparagus.name: Salmon with Asparagus
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking tray. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Top salmon with lemon slices.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until salmon is cooked through.

salmorejo.name: Salmorejo
steps: Blend tomatoes, olive oil, bread crumbs, garlic, vinegar, and salt until smooth.
Chill before serving.
Garnish with chopped hard-boiled eggs.

saltimbocca.name: Saltimbocca
steps: Place a slice of prosciutto and a fresh sage leaf on each veal cutlet, securing them with toothpicks.
In a skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium-high heat, and cook the veal cutlets until browned on both sides.
Remove the veal from the pan and deglaze with white wine, scraping up any bits stuck to the pan.
Reduce the wine until slightly thickened, then return the veal to the pan, cooking for an additional minute.
Serve immediately, drizzled with the reduced sauce.

samosaChaat.name: Samosa Chaat
steps: Break the samosas into bite-sized pieces and place them on a serving plate.
Drizzle yogurt evenly over the samosa pieces.
Top with tamarind chutney and green chutney to taste.
Sprinkle sev, chopped onions, and fresh coriander over the chaat.
Serve immediately to enjoy the crispy textures.

ingredients: 500g chicken or pork, sliced into strips
satay.name: satay
steps: in a bowl, mix soy sauce, peanut butter, sugar, curry powder, and vegetable oil to make a marinade.
add the meat to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
thread the marinated meat onto the soaked skewers.
grill the skewers over medium heat until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
serve with peanut sauce for dipping.

sauerbraten.name: Sauerbraten
steps: Marinate beef in vinegar, water, onion, garlic, carrots, bay leaves, sugar, and juniper berries for 3 days.
Remove beef and brown in a pan.
Add marinade and simmer for 2 hours.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

sausageRolls.name: Sausage Rolls
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F).
In a bowl, combine sausage mince, onion, carrot, salt, and pepper.
Cut pastry sheets in half and spoon the sausage mixture along the edge of each piece.
Roll up and cut into small pieces. Brush with beaten egg.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and crispy.

scallionPancakes.name: Scallion Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour and water to form a dough. Knead until smooth, then let it rest for 30 minutes.
Divide the dough into small balls and roll each ball into a flat circle.
Brush with sesame oil, sprinkle with scallions and salt, then roll it up and flatten again.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan and fry the pancakes until golden and crispy on both sides.
Serve hot.

scones.name: Scones
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F) and line a baking tray with parchment paper.
In a bowl, rub butter into the flour and salt until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.
Gradually add milk to form a soft dough.
Turn the dough onto a floured surface, knead lightly, and cut into rounds.
Place on the baking tray and bake for 12-15 minutes until golden.
Serve warm with jam and whipped cream.

sernik.name: sernik
steps: preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
in a bowl, mix crushed biscuits with melted butter and press into the bottom of a greased springform pan.
in another bowl, blend twaróg, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until smooth.
pour the mixture over the biscuit base.
bake for 50-60 minutes until set and slightly golden.
let cool before slicing.

sernikNaZimno.name: sernik na zimno
steps: in a bowl, mix crushed biscuits with melted butter and press into the bottom of a springform pan.
in another bowl, blend twaróg, sugar, and cream until smooth.
dissolve gelatin in warm milk and mix into the cheese mixture.
pour over the biscuit base and chill in the fridge for at least 4 hours until set.
slice and serve cold.

sesameBalls.name: Sesame Balls (Jian Dui)
steps: In a bowl, mix glutinous rice flour, sugar, and water to form a dough.
Divide the dough, fill with red bean paste, and shape into balls.
Roll the balls in sesame seeds to coat.
Deep fry the sesame balls until golden and crispy.
Serve warm.

sesameChicken.name: Sesame Chicken
steps: Coat the chicken pieces in beaten egg and cornstarch.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan and deep-fry the chicken until golden and crispy. Set aside.
In a separate pan, stir-fry soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, sesame oil, and sesame seeds.
Add the fried chicken and toss to coat with the sauce.
Serve hot.

shabuShabu.name: Shabu Shabu
steps: In a pot, bring dashi broth to a boil.
Add napa cabbage, shiitake mushrooms, and tofu to the pot.
Once the vegetables are tender, dip slices of beef into the boiling broth until cooked (about 5-10 seconds).
Serve with ponzu sauce and sesame sauce for dipping.

shakshuka.name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat oil and cook onion, garlic, and bell pepper until softened.
Add tomato sauce, cumin, paprika, and chili powder.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with bread.

shanghaiSoupDumplings.name: Shanghai Soup Dumplings (Xiao Long Bao)
steps: Mix pork, soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic for the filling.
Add a small cube of gelatinized broth to each wrapper along with the filling.
Seal and steam for 10-12 minutes.
Serve with vinegar and ginger dipping sauce.

shawarma.name: Shawarma
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, shawarma spice mix, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until fully cooked.
Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce, pickles, and vegetables.

shepherdsPie.name: Shepherd's Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cook ground meat, onion, and carrots until browned.
Add tomato paste and beef broth, and simmer until thickened.
Add peas and season with salt and pepper.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with milk and butter.
Spread meat mixture in a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes.
Bake for 25 minutes until top is golden.

shiratama.name: Shiratama
steps: Mix glutinous rice flour with water to form a dough.
Shape into small balls and boil until they float.
Let cool, then fill with sweet red bean paste.
Dust with matcha powder before serving.

shrimpDumplings.name: Shrimp Dumplings (Har Gow)
steps: In a bowl, mix shrimp, bamboo shoots, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, green onion, salt, and pepper.
Place a small amount of the filling in the center of each dumpling wrapper and fold to seal.
Steam the dumplings for 10-12 minutes until fully cooked.
Serve hot.

shrimpOnTheBarbie.name: Shrimp on the Barbie
steps: In a bowl, mix prawns, olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Preheat the grill and cook the prawns for 2-3 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Serve with lemon wedges.

sichuanBoiledFish.name: Sichuan Boiled Fish
steps: Heat oil in a pan and stir-fry garlic, ginger, and doubanjiang until fragrant.
Add chicken broth, soy sauce, chili oil, and Sichuan peppercorns. Bring to a boil.
Add the fish fillets and simmer for 5-7 minutes until cooked through.
Garnish with green onions and serve hot.

simit.name: Simit
steps: Mix flour, yeast, sugar, and salt; gradually add water to form a dough.
Shape into rings and dip in a water-sugar solution, then in sesame seeds.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) until golden.

sinigangNaBaboy.name: Sinigang na Baboy
steps: In a large pot, add the pork belly and pour in 1 liter of water. Bring to a boil.
Once boiling, add the tomatoes and onion. Lower the heat and simmer until the pork is tender, about 45 minutes to an hour.
Stir in the tamarind paste and add the radish and string beans.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Continue to simmer until the vegetables are cooked, about 10-15 minutes.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

sisig.name: Sisig
steps: In a pot, boil the pork face until tender. Once cooked, grill the pork until slightly charred, then chop finely.
In a skillet, sauté the chopped onions and green chilies until fragrant.
Add the grilled pork and mix well. Season with soy sauce, calamansi juice, salt, and pepper.
Transfer to a serving plate and top with a raw egg. Serve immediately while hot.

smazonySerek.name: smazony serek
steps: dip cheese slices in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs.
heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
fry cheese until golden brown on both sides, about 2-3 minutes per side.
drain on paper towels and serve hot with dipping sauce.

ingredients: 1 cup green beans, cut into pieces
somTum.name: som tum
steps: in a large bowl, combine shredded papaya, green beans, and tomatoes.
in a mortar and pestle, pound the chilies, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar together until well mixed.
pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine thoroughly.
garnish with crushed peanuts before serving.

ingredients: 1-inch piece of turmeric, minced (or 1 teaspoon turmeric powder)
sotoAyam.name: Soto ayam
steps: in a large pot, bring water to a boil. add the whole chicken and cook until fully cooked, about 30-40 minutes.
once cooked, remove the chicken and set aside. reserve the chicken broth.
in a separate pot, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. add chopped onion, minced garlic, ginger, turmeric, and lemongrass. sauté until fragrant.
pour in about 1 liter of the reserved chicken broth into the sautéed spices. add kaffir lime leaves and bring to a simmer.
shred the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces and add it back into the pot. simmer for another 10-15 minutes.
season with salt, pepper, and soy sauce to taste.
serve the soto ayam hot in bowls with a ladle of broth and pieces of chicken.
garnish with boiled eggs, bean sprouts, and chopped green onions.
serve with lime wedges on the side and rice or noodles as desired.

souffle.name: Soufflé
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
In another bowl, mix egg yolks, sugar, flour, butter, milk, and vanilla.
Fold in egg whites gently.
Pour into greased ramekins and bake for 15-20 minutes.
Serve immediately.

spaghettiBolognese.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, sauté onion and garlic until soft, then add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, Italian herbs, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over spaghetti and top with grated Parmesan.

spaghettiPuttanesca.name: Spaghetti alla Puttanesca
steps: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water according to the package instructions until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant.
Add the chopped tomatoes, olives, capers, and a pinch of chili flakes to the pan, stirring to combine.
Once the spaghetti is cooked, drain it and add it to the pan with the sauce.
Toss the spaghetti in the sauce until well coated, and serve immediately, garnished with fresh basil if desired.

spaghettiVongole.name: Spaghetti alle Vongole
steps: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add the clams and pour in white wine. Cover the skillet and cook until the clams open, about 5-7 minutes.
Discard any clams that do not open. Toss the cooked spaghetti in the skillet with the clams.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and serve immediately.

spicySichuanGreenBeans.name: Spicy Sichuan Green Beans
steps: Blanch green beans in boiling water for 2 minutes and drain.
Stir-fry garlic, chili paste, and Sichuan peppercorns in oil until fragrant.
Add green beans and soy sauce, and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Serve hot.

springRolls.name: Spring Rolls
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add cabbage, carrots, and bean sprouts. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce and salt. Cook for another minute, then remove from heat.
Mix cornstarch with water to form a paste. This will be used to seal the spring rolls.
Place a small amount of the filling on a spring roll wrapper and roll it tightly, sealing the edges with the cornstarch paste.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry the spring rolls until golden and crispy.
Serve with dipping sauce.

steamedBuns.name: Steamed Buns (Baozi)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, yeast, sugar, and warm water to form a dough. Knead until smooth and let it rise for 1 hour.
In another bowl, mix ground pork, cabbage, garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper.
Divide the dough into small balls, flatten them, and place a spoonful of filling in the center.
Pinch the edges together to seal the buns.
Steam the buns for 15-20 minutes until fully cooked.
Serve hot.

steamedFishWithGinger.name: Steamed Fish with Ginger
steps: Place the fish in a steamer and steam for 10-12 minutes.
In a pan, heat sesame oil and stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Pour the mixture over the steamed fish, drizzle with soy sauce, and garnish with green onions.

stickyRiceMango.name: Sticky Rice with Mango
steps: soak the glutinous rice in water for at least 4 hours or overnight.
steam the soaked rice for about 20-30 minutes until cooked.
in a saucepan, heat coconut milk with sugar until dissolved.
reserve a small amount of the coconut sauce for drizzling later.
combine the cooked rice with the remaining coconut sauce and mix well.
serve the sticky rice with mango slices, drizzled with reserved coconut sauce and garnished with sesame seeds.

stirFriedGreenBeans.name: Stir-Fried Green Beans
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a pan and stir-fry green beans for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and sugar. Stir well and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

stracciatellaSoup.name: Stracciatella Soup
steps: In a pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil over medium heat.
In a bowl, beat the eggs together with grated Parmesan cheese.
Slowly drizzle the egg mixture into the boiling broth while stirring gently to create ribbons.
Season the soup with salt, black pepper, and chopped parsley before serving.

stuffedBellPeppers.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Cook ground beef, onion, and garlic until browned.
Mix with rice, tomato sauce, and Italian seasoning.
Stuff peppers with mixture and top with cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes.

stuffedZucchini.name: Stuffed Zucchini
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Scoop out the zucchini halves and mix the flesh with quinoa, vegetables, cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Fill the zucchini halves with the mixture and place on a baking tray.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until the zucchini is tender and the tops are golden.
Garnish with fresh herbs before serving.

suman.name: Suman
steps: In a pot, cook the glutinous rice with coconut milk and sugar until it becomes sticky, about 30 minutes.
Take banana leaves, cut into squares, and use them to wrap small portions of the sticky rice.
Steam the wrapped rice until cooked through, about 20-30 minutes.
Serve warm with extra sugar or latik (coconut curds).

ingredients: Wasabi and pickled ginger for serving
sushi.name: Sushi
steps: Rinse rice until water runs clear. Cook in a rice cooker with water.
Mix rice vinegar and sugar. Stir into cooked rice and cool.
Place rice on nori sheets and add fish slices.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

suya.name: suya
steps: coat the beef slices with suya spice and ground peanuts.
thread the beef onto skewers.
brush with oil and grill over medium heat for 10-15 minutes.
serve with sliced onions and tomatoes.

sweetAndSourPork.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
steps: Coat pork cubes in cornstarch and deep-fry until golden.
In a pan, mix soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and ketchup to make the sauce.
Add bell pepper, pineapple, and fried pork, and toss in the sauce.
Serve hot.

sweetSourPork.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
steps: Coat the pork cubes in beaten egg and cornstarch.
Heat oil in a pan and deep-fry the pork until golden and crispy. Set aside.
In a separate pan, stir-fry onions and bell peppers for 2-3 minutes.
Add soy sauce, rice vinegar, ketchup, sugar, and pineapple to the pan. Stir well.
Add the fried pork and stir to coat it with the sauce.
Serve hot with rice.

ingredients: sour cream or jam for serving
syrniki.name: syrniki
steps: in a bowl, mix cottage cheese, egg, flour, sugar, and salt until combined.
form small patties with the mixture.
heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and fry the syrniki until golden brown on both sides.
drain on paper towels and serve warm with sour cream or jam.

tabbouleh.name: Tabbouleh
steps: Soak bulgur in water until tender.
Mix with parsley, mint, tomato, and cucumber.
Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for topping
tacos.name: Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water. Simmer until well combined.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1 cup cooked beans (can be black or pinto)
tacuTacu.name: Tacu Tacu
steps: heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic.
mash the cooked beans slightly and add to the pan.
mix in the cooked rice and season with salt and pepper.
press the mixture into the pan to form a crust, then flip to brown the other side.
serve hot, with fried plantains or steak.

ingredients: Sweet red bean paste or custard (for filling)
taiyaki.name: Taiyaki
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk egg and water together, then combine with dry ingredients.
Heat a taiyaki pan and pour batter into fish-shaped molds.
Add filling, cover with more batter, and cook until golden brown.
Remove and serve warm.

tamagoSandwich.name: Tamago Sandwich
steps: Boil the eggs until hard-boiled, then peel and mash in a bowl.
Mix with mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Spread the egg mixture between the slices of bread.
Cut in half and serve.

tapas.name: Tapas
steps: Arrange olives, chorizo, cheese, almonds, and artichokes on a platter.
Serve with tomato salsa and enjoy.

tapsilog.name: Tapsilog
steps: Marinate the beef in soy sauce, vinegar, and crushed garlic for at least 30 minutes.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and fry the marinated beef until cooked through and slightly crispy.
In another pan, fry the eggs sunny-side up.
To serve, place a portion of garlic fried rice on a plate, top with the cooked beef and fried eggs, and serve with vinegar dipping sauce.

tartaDeSantiago.name: Tarta de Santiago
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, mix almond flour, sugar, eggs, lemon zest, and cinnamon until combined.
Pour batter into a greased tart pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden.
Let cool and dust with powdered sugar before serving.

teaEggs.name: Tea Eggs
steps: Boil the eggs for 8 minutes, then remove and crack the shells slightly.
In a pot, add water, soy sauce, tea leaves, five-spice powder, cinnamon stick, star anise, sugar, and salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and add the cracked eggs.
Simmer for 1 hour, then let the eggs sit in the liquid for an additional 2 hours.
Peel and serve.

thaiFishCakes.name: Thai fish cakes
steps: in a bowl, combine minced fish, red curry paste, egg, fish sauce, and sugar.
mix well and form into small patties.
heat vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
fry the patties until golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs.

thaiIcedTea.name: thai iced tea
steps: boil water in a pot and add thai tea leaves, steeping for about 5 minutes.
strain the tea into a pitcher and stir in sugar until dissolved.
let the tea cool to room temperature.
serve over ice, adding milk or condensed milk to taste.

thaiSpringRolls.name: thai spring rolls
steps: soak rice paper wrappers in warm water until softened, about 10-15 seconds.
place the wrapper on a flat surface and layer with shrimp, noodles, lettuce, carrot, and herbs.
fold the sides over the filling and roll tightly from the bottom up.
repeat until all ingredients are used.
serve with peanut sauce for dipping.

threeCupChicken.name: Three Cup Chicken
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan and fry garlic and ginger.
Add chicken and brown on all sides.
Pour in soy sauce, rice wine, and cook until the sauce thickens.
Stir in basil leaves and serve.

tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
steps: Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold in mascarpone cheese.
Whip cream until stiff peaks form and fold into mascarpone mixture.
Combine coffee and liqueur and dip ladyfingers.
Layer ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture in a dish.
Dust with cocoa powder and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.

tocino.name: Tocino
steps: In a bowl, mix the pork belly with sugar, soy sauce, pineapple juice, salt, and pepper. Marinate for at least 24 hours in the refrigerator.
In a skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Fry the marinated pork until golden brown and caramelized, about 5-7 minutes on each side.
Serve with garlic rice and fried eggs.

tomYumGoong.name: tom yum goong
steps: in a pot, bring the water to a boil.
add lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, and smashed chilies to the boiling water.
reduce heat and let it simmer for about 5-10 minutes to infuse the flavors.
add the mushrooms and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
stir in the shrimp and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes.
season the soup with fish sauce and lime juice.
serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

tonkatsu.name: Tonkatsu
steps: Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper.
Dredge each cutlet in flour, dip in beaten egg, then coat with panko breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a pan and fry cutlets until golden and cooked through.
Slice and serve with tonkatsu sauce.

tortillaEspañola.name: Tortilla Española
steps: Peel and thinly slice potatoes and onion.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and sauté potatoes and onion until soft.
Beat eggs in a bowl and add the potato mixture.
Pour back into the skillet and cook until set.
Flip to cook both sides and serve.

torty.name: torty
steps: preheat oven to 180°c (350°f).
in a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, eggs, milk, and melted butter until smooth.
pour batter into a greased cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
let cool and layer with fruits or cream as desired.

twiceCookedPork.name: Twice Cooked Pork
steps: Boil the pork belly for 20 minutes, then cool and slice.
Stir-fry ginger and doubanjiang in oil, add pork belly and cook until browned.
Add soy sauce, rice wine, bell pepper, and green onion.
Cook for another 5 minutes and serve.

ingredients: filling of choice (e.g., potatoes, cherries, or cottage cheese)
vareniki.name: vareniki
steps: in a bowl, mix flour, egg, water, and salt to form a dough. knead until smooth.
roll out the dough to about 2mm thickness and cut into circles.
place a spoonful of filling in the center of each circle, fold, and seal.
boil water in a large pot and drop in the vareniki. cook for 5-7 minutes until they float.
remove and serve with sour cream or melted butter.

vegemiteToast.name: Vegemite on Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Spread butter on the toast, followed by a thin layer of Vegemite.
Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1 cup Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, spinach, tomatoes)
vegetableFrittata.name: Vegetable Frittata
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté mixed vegetables until tender.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, cheese, salt, and pepper, then pour over the vegetables.
Cook on the stove for a few minutes before transferring to the oven to bake for 15-20 minutes until set.

vegetableSamosa.name: Vegetable Samosa
steps: Heat oil in a pan, cook cumin seeds, garlic, and onion until softened.
Add potatoes, green peas, coriander seeds, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook for a few minutes.
Allow the filling to cool.
Fill the samosa pastry with the mixture and seal the edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

vegetableSausageRolls.name: Vegetable Sausage Rolls
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F) and line a baking tray.
In a bowl, mix mixed vegetables, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper.
Roll out puff pastry and cut into rectangles. Place filling on one end, roll, and seal.
Brush with beaten egg and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden.

ingredients: 2 cups Mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots)
vegetableStirFry.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, sautéing until fragrant.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for about 5-7 minutes until tender.
Drizzle with soy sauce and season with salt and pepper. Stir well to combine.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

wontons.name: Wontons
steps: In a bowl, mix ground pork, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil, and green onion.
Place a small amount of the filling in the center of each wonton wrapper.
Brush the edges of the wrapper with beaten egg and fold to seal.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry the wontons until golden and crispy.
Serve with dipping sauce.

yakiOnigiri.name: Yaki Onigiri
steps: Shape cooked rice into triangular or oval shapes.
Grill the rice balls until crispy and golden, brushing with soy sauce while grilling.
Serve warm, optionally wrapped in nori.

yakiTori.name: Yaki Tori
steps: Soak skewers in water for 30 minutes to prevent burning.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sake, mirin, and sugar to create a marinade.
Thread chicken pieces and green onions onto skewers.
Marinate skewers for 15 minutes.
Grill over medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally and basting with marinade.

ingredients: Vegetables for grilling (e.g., bell peppers, onions)
yakiniku.name: Yakiniku
steps: Marinate beef in soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and garlic for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill or grill pan.
Grill beef and vegetables until cooked to your liking.
Serve with rice.

youtiao.name: Youtiao (Chinese Fried Dough)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, salt, and water to form a dough. Knead until smooth and let it rest for 1 hour.
Roll the dough into long strips and cut into small pieces.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep pan and fry the dough pieces until golden and crispy.
Serve warm.

yufka.name: Yufka
steps: Mix flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
Roll out thinly and cook on a hot griddle until lightly browned.
Use for wraps or as a side.

zoni.name: Zoni
steps: Heat dashi broth in a pot and add carrots and mushrooms.
Simmer until tender, then add mochi.
Once mochi is soft, add greens and season with soy sauce and salt.
Serve hot in bowls.

zrazy.name: zrazy
steps: in a pan, cook bacon until crispy, then add onion and carrot, cooking until softened.
season beef slices with salt and pepper, then place a spoonful of filling on each slice and roll up tightly.
dust with flour and heat oil in a skillet.
fry the rolls until browned on all sides, then simmer in a little water until cooked through.
serve with potatoes or rice.

zucchiniBread.name: Zucchini Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
In another bowl, whisk sugar, brown sugar, oil, and eggs.
Stir in zucchini and then mix with dry ingredients.
Pour batter into loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

zucchiniSlice.name: Zucchini Slice
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F) and grease a baking dish.
In a bowl, mix grated zucchini, onion, eggs, flour, cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture into the baking dish and bake for 30-35 minutes until golden.
Let cool slightly before slicing and serving.

zupaKremZPomidorow.name: zupa krem z pomidorow
steps: in a pot, sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
add tomatoes and vegetable broth, bringing to a boil.
reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
blend until smooth, then stir in cream.
season with salt and pepper before serving, garnished with basil.

zuppaToscana.name: Zuppa Toscana
steps: In a large pot, cook the Italian sausage over medium heat until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, add diced onion and chopped potatoes, sautéing in olive oil until the onion is translucent.
Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until the potatoes are tender.
Stir in the cooked sausage and chopped kale, cooking until the kale is wilted.
Add cream to the soup, stirring to combine, and heat through before serving.

zurek.name: żurek
steps: in a pot, bring water to a boil and add chopped onion and garlic.
add smoked sausage and bay leaf, simmering for about 20 minutes.
remove from heat and stir in sour rye starter and vinegar.
season with salt and pepper to taste.
serve hot with sliced hard-boiled eggs.

zurekZBialaKielbasa.name: zurek z biala kielbasa
steps: in a pot, bring water to a boil and add chopped onion and garlic.
add white sausage and bay leaf, simmering for about 20 minutes.
stir in sour rye starter, seasoning with salt and pepper.
serve hot with sliced hard-boiled eggs.
